DOC.criteria: Diagnosed congenital haemophilia A B inhibitor factor VIII IX , respectively A history 3 joint bleeds last 12 month Joint bleed within 7 day prior trial start Treatment bleed within last 5 day prior trial start Clinically relevant coagulation disorder congenital haemophilia A B
